event.description: The video begins with a view of the Vibe Manager application. The user initiates a 'Deep Research' function based on a task description about video folder styling and utilizing Remotion.
The system processes this request, which is shown as a 'Web Search Prompts Generation' task in the 'Background Tasks' panel.
Once the task is complete, the user clicks on it to open a 'Job Details' modal.

The modal displays information about the job, including the AI model used (gemini-2.5-pro), token usage, and the generated research prompts related to Remotion, performance, and Tailwind CSS integration.
The user closes the 'Job Details' modal and returns to the main screen.
The user clicks on the 'Found 3 Research Findings' button, which populates the main 'Task Description' text area with the detailed results from the research.
The user scrolls through the newly added, comprehensive research findings.

The content is structured with sections on implementation, performance, configuration, limitations, and best practices for using Remotion and Tailwind CSS, complete with code snippets and links to documentation.
After reviewing the research, the user scrolls down past the 'Find Relevant Files' section to the 'Implementation Plans' area.
The video ends with the user positioned at the 'Implementation Plans' section, indicating the next step is to create an action plan based on the gathered information.
